Subject: OOC - About Battle at CF, all involved READ

(I won't be able to post for a while today.  I'm kind of sick (stuffy nose, 
sore throat, painful coughing, it won't stop!  Five days now!).  Also, for 
the next dozen or so hours, I'm going to be Christmas shopping.  I've noticed 
a few things in the battle that were posted by Maxis and will help me OH so 
much.  I'm glad the Maxis are so desperate.

Also, Iron Raptor, the Alliance will never fall, and you have surprise?  I 
have a surprise.  Oh, yes.  I have a surprise!  AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

JOKER'S ON THE REBOUND BABY!

Sorry, couldn't help it.  But seriously, I'll be gone for the next dozen 
hours in malls, stores, and other places like that.  I don't like it, since I 
need liquid every ten minutes to keep my throat from completely drying up.  
But, if I don't shop now, it probably won't happen.  So, season's greetings 
from Oblitertron.  When he's done with all of you, he'll make your lifeless 
Maximal corpses into one ginormous Christmas card :)


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
PS: I'm not cocky, the Alliance never loses, AHAHAHAHAHAHA!  Unless Yan is a 
coward and back--what are you doing Chyort?  No, no, NOOOOOOOOO--!!!
(Sorry, have problems with a certain Russian psychic warrior, I'll be back in 
a dozen hours when the doctors reattach my eye balls into my sockets.  
Yanshoshage knows what I be talking about)
